Player History
Earned first career win on 4/3/1985...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1985, off David Palmer (MON)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago to New York (Y) on 7/24/1985 (Going to CHC: CF Shane Mack, RF Roberto Kelly. Going to NYY: P Dennis Eckersley)...
Injured on 8/26/1985 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/8/1986 to a 5-year deal worth $8,250,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 1987, going 19-9, 2.19 ERA...
Released by Oakland on 10/3/1989...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/9/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/4/1990 with a Inflamed Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/5/1992 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
